topic.title: Exceptions to the criterion that the sale should be expected to be completed in one year (paragraphs 8 and B1)

body.p: An exception to the one‑year requirement in paragraph 8 applies in limited situations in which the period required to complete the sale of a non‑current asset (or disposal group) will be (or has been) extended by events or circumstances beyond an entity’s control and specified conditions are met (paragraphs 9 and B1). Examples 5–7 illustrate those situations.
